      • findMerge

        protected int findMerge()
        Description copied from class: Anderberg.Instance
        Perform the next merge step.

        Due to the cache, this is now O(n) each time, instead of O(n*n).

        Overrides:
        findMerge in class Anderberg.Instance
        Returns:
